CustomField.description: Formula field to read mulit-select picklist values for search and filtering.
CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES( Division_s__c , "Modular Solutions") , "Modular Solutions; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Division_s__c , "Workforce Solutions") , "Workforce Solutions; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Division_s__c , "Energy Services") , "Energy Services; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Division_s__c , "LodgeLink") , "LodgeLink; ", "") & IF( INCLUDES( Division_s__c , "International") , "International; ", "")
CustomField.label: Division Text
